name: Cinema UI
description: A user interface (UI) visuals overhaul mod for Hitman: World of Assassination (WoA).

options.name: OFF (Game Default)
options.tooltip: The default attraction screen for Hitman: World of Assasination (2023).

options.name: Hitman WoA| Hybrid
options.tooltip: A hybrid Hitman 3: World of Assassination logo.

options.name: 2007 Movie
options.tooltip: The custom movie logo from Hitman (2007 movie).

options.name: OFF (Game Default)
options.tooltip: The default attraction screen for Hitman: World of Assasination (2023).

options.name: Hitman WoA| Signature
options.tooltip: The 'signature edition' attraction screen from Hitman: WoA's release on the Ninten'DONT' switch 2 (2025).

options.name: World Map| Red (47)
options.tooltip: A custom Hitman 3: WoA attraction screen made for the release of Cinema UI.

options.name: H3| Classic
options.tooltip: Hitman 3's attraction screen as it was in 2021.

options.name: H3| Full-Size
options.tooltip: Hitman 3's attraction screen full-size and zoomed out more.

options.name: Sniper 47
options.tooltip: Hitman 3's sniper game mode image as your attraction screen.

options.name: World Map| Blue (Night)
options.tooltip: Made for the release of Cinema UI. A low-light environment blue world map with blurred lines in 4K resolution.

options.name: World Map| Red (Strategic)
options.tooltip: Made for the release of Cinema UI. A brighter-red world map in strategic-view, artistically-darkened with blurred lines in 4K resolution.

options.name: Heritage UI| Redux v2
options.tooltip: A reborn version of Heritage UI (HUI)'s custom ''Redux'' main menu background in 4K resolution.

options.name: Upscaled Only
options.tooltip: Upscaled x4, downscaled again back to 1440p, and cleaned up during the process.

options.name: Colorful
options.tooltip: Images are upscaled and have made more colorful and vibrant.

options.name: Realistic
options.tooltip: Images are upscaled and have made closer to reality in color and lighting.
